rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0001
rows.name: What? Irina's team is calling for reinforcements?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Turns out we found a piece of the Lifehold out in Oblivia.
Those guys are after it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0005
rows.name:
What?! We found a Lifehold unit?
That's great![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0008
rows.name: But it's in primo condition—and every piece counts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0009
rows.name: Irina's team just happened to draw the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Trouble. Seems our Ganglion pals
have a base right near there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0013
rows.name:
I see. And their soldiers have come between
Irina's crew and the Lifehold—is that it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0014
rows.name: Bingo. That's why we need to move quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0015
rows.name: There's no time to lose. We'll leave immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0016
rows.name: Send us the mission data on FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0018
rows.name: I'll send it to everyone's comm devices.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs07030100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Just be careful... The clock's still ticking,
and we can't afford to lose our best people.[ST:wait ]
